title: Vegetable Soup
description: A hearty and nutritious vegetable soup.
instructions: Chop the carrots, potatoes, and broccoli.
In a large pot, combine chopped vegetables and vegetable broth. Bring to a boil.
Simmer until vegetables are tender. Serve hot.
author: soniafrances

title: Chocolate Cake
description: Rich chocolate sponge with a chocolate buttercream icing.
instructions: Mix the chocolate, flour, butter, and sugar in a bowl.
Bake in the preheated oven for 30-40 minutes or until a toothpick inserted comes out clean.
Let it cool completely before icing with chocolate buttercream.
author: Admin
